ADD_BOOKMARK.description: Button to add a singular bookmark

ANISOTROPIC_FILTERING_DESC.message: Uzorkuje teksturu kroz više MIP razina kako bi se dobila mnogo jasnija tekstura kada se gleda pod plitkim kutovima. Sprječava zamućenje tekstura; međutim, to može imati veliki utjecaj na performanse.

FLIGHTLOG_DOCKING.description: Used in Flight Log, to indicate player's position. 'primary_info' is a station name

FLIGHTLOG_FLYING.description: Used in Flight Log, to indicate player's position. 'primary_info' is the name of a space body

FLIGHTLOG_HYPERSPACE.description: Used in Flight Log, to indicate player's position. 'primary_info' is the star system targeted for hyperspace jump.

FLIGHTLOG_JUMPING.description: Used in Flight Log, to indicate player's position. 'primary_info' is the star system targeted for hyperspace jump.

FLIGHTLOG_LANDED.description: Used in Flight Log, to indicate player's position, 'primary_info' is the name of a space body, typically a planet, the other two variables are latitude and longitude as floating point number, e.g. 'Landed on Trantor, position (-43.23, 67.89)'

FLIGHTLOG_STARPORT_ORBITAL.description: Used in Flight Log, to indicate player's position. 'primary_info' is a station name, 'secondary_info' is a space body (planet, moon/satelite, star) name

FLIGHTLOG_STARPORT_SURFACE.description: Used in Flight Log, to indicate player's position. 'primary_info' is a station name, 'secondary_info' is a space body (planet, moon/satelite, star) name

FLIGHTLOG_UNDOCKING.description: Used in Flight Log, to indicate player's position. 'primary_info' is a station name

FREE.description: Used in Ship Information view as in Capacity: 10t (5t free)

PLEASE_REPORT_THIS_ERROR.message:
Ups, nešto je ovdje pošlo po zlu! Molimo vas da prijavite korake za reprodukciju ove greške, zapisnik izlaza i datoteku za spremanje u Pioneer sustav za praćenje problema na Githubu.
Zapisnik izlaza možete pronaći na: {path}/output.txt

STANDARD_GAME_START_TIME.description: Standard game start time, current moment + 1200 years

START_AT_BARNARDS_STAR_DESC.message: Ovo je težak početak iz zatvorske stanice za odmor u Administraciji sustava.

START_AT_MARS_DESC.message: Ovo je jednostavan početak sa Cydonije na Marsu u Sunčevom sustavu.

START_AT_NEW_HOPE.description: New Hope is an in game location

START_AT_NEW_HOPE_DESC.message: Ovo je umjereni početak od Itzaleana na New Hopeu u sustavu Epsilon Eridani.

START_LOG_ENTRY_1.description: First custom log message when starting a new game, giving backstory to the character. Importantly we here hint at what actions the player is best to take: buy fuel, get reputation, ask for take off clearance.
START_LOG_ENTRY_1.message: Nažalost, ujak mi nikad nije pokazao kako upravljati ovom starom teglenicom dok je bio živ, ali mislim da to sada upisujem u brodski dnevnik. Čudno je, još ga osjećam, kao da je u samim zidovima ovog broda. Možda mi može biti kopilot i zajedno ćemo ostvariti svoju sudbinu u velikoj praznini. Ali prvo, samo trebam kupiti malo vodika za skokovni pogon, isplanirati kurs do unosnih trgovačkih prilika i moliti se nebesima da kontrola prometa dopusti neiskusnom pilotu poput mene da poletjeti, a onda ćemo vidjeti što ova beba može učiniti. Vrijeme je da si stvorim reputaciju!

START_LOG_ENTRY_2.description: First custom log message when starting a new game, giving backstory to the character, here going for a Blade Runner feeling
START_LOG_ENTRY_2.message: Čizme su mi još mokre od jake kiše sinoć, kod kuće. Pločnik se toliko namočio da je - naizgled, u činu osvete - preplavio noćno nebo reflektiranim sjajem neonskih znakova koji su gledali na mokru ulicu. Ali uspio sam, kroz kišu, doći do svog spojnog leta za zvjezdanu luku gdje me čekao moj novi brod. Zaštitar zvjezdane luke čudno me pogledao kad sam mu rekao da sam ovdje po brod. Pretpostavljam da nisam izgledao kao tipičan svemirac, prodavši sve što sam imao da uložim u ovu zahrđalu staru kantu, dok sam stajao pred njim, mokrih čizama i svega ostalog. Ali zaista osjećam da će od sada moja budućnost biti zapisana u zvijezdama. Sada samo trebam pronaći ključ za pokretanje.

START_LOG_ENTRY_3.description: First custom log message when starting a new game, giving backstory to the character. Here explaining why there's no hyperdrive in the ship, and what to do about it.
START_LOG_ENTRY_3.message: Nakon dugog birokratskog procesa, konačno sam dobio svoj brod natrag iz zapljene, ali su ga ogolili do golog metala kako bi platili 'dug' za koji su tvrdili da ga imam. Ne samo da su mi uzeli omiljeni aparat za kavu, već su ti gadovi i iščupali hiperpogon, tako da sam zasad zaglavljen u ovom sustavu, osim ako ne prodam ono što je ostalo u brodu kako bih financirao novi pogon. Ali kako kažu: kad ti život daje limune - napravi limunadu; pa čak i ako se vratim na početak, mislit ću o ovome kao o prilici, a ne kao o neuspjehu, drugoj šansi. Bez kave. Otpuštajući ono što jesam, postat ću ono što bih mogao biti. Svijet će se okrenuti i pustiti me da prođem, kao što to čini s onima koji znaju kamo idu, a ja idem prema zvijezdama.

STATION.description: Flight log info, will refer to a station by name

STATION_DOCKS.description: Information shown in the station lobby, for total number of docking pads
STATION_DOCKS.message: Naš ukupni kapacitet je {total_docking_pads} priključnih mjesta.

STATION_LOCAL_GRAVITY_PRESSURE.message: Lokalna gravitacija ovdje je %,2f g, a atmosferski tlak %,2f atm.

STATION_ORBIT.description: Information shown in the station loby
STATION_ORBIT.message: Nalazimo se u orbiti oko {parent_body} u trajanju od {orbit_period} dana.

STATION_TECH_TOO_LOW.message: Razina tehnologije stanice preniska je za prodaju ovog predmeta

SUMMARY.description: Tab item in the start game menu

SYSTEM_BODY_INDEX_IS_OUT_OF_RANGE.message: Indeks tijela sustava je izvan raspona

SYSTEM_FACTION.description: Tooltip indicating the faction controlling this system

SYSTEM_INFORMATION.description: Tooltip / label indicating information about a selected star system

SYSTEM_NUM_STARS.description: Tooltip indicating the system stellar arrangement

SYSTEM_SECURITY_1.description: Security category for systems with low lawlessness. A nod to Elite's pilot ratings.

SYSTEM_SECURITY_2.description: Security category for systems with low lawlessness. A nod to Elite's pilot ratings.

SYSTEM_SECURITY_3.description: Security category for systems with low lawlessness. A nod to Elite's pilot ratings.

SYSTEM_SECURITY_4.description: Security category for systems with low lawlessness. A nod to Elite's pilot ratings.

SYSTEM_SECURITY_5.description: Security category for systems with low lawlessness. A nod to Elite's pilot ratings.

SYSTEM_SECURITY_TOOLTIP.description: Tooltip introducing the system security rating

TECH_CERTIFIED.description: Lobby screen shows the tech level (an integer number) of the station
TECH_CERTIFIED.message: Ova stanica posjeduje tehnološki certifikat razine {tech_level}.

TECH_CERTIFIED_MILITARY.description: Lobby screen shows the tech level of the station
TECH_CERTIFIED_MILITARY.message: Ova instalacija ima odobrenje za vojnu tehnologiju.

TECH_LEVEL.description: System view label for technology level

TEXTURE_COMPRESSION.message: To oslobađa više memorije za grafičku karticu, što je vjerojatno ono što želite, na štetu njihove kompresije tijekom pokretanja igre.

THANKS_AND_REMEMBER_TO_BUY_FUEL.message: Thank you for your purchase. Remember to fit equipment and buy fuel before you depart.

THERE_IS_NOBODY_ELSE_ON_BOARD_ABLE_TO_FL.message: Nema nikoga drugog na brodu tko bi mogao upravljati ovim brodom.

THESE_ITEMS_ARE_PUNISHABLE_BY_FINE.message: Kupnja, prodaja i prijevoz ovih predmeta kažnjivi su novčanom kaznom i mogućom oduzimanjem

THE_SHIP_IS_UNDER_STATION_CONTROL_COMMAN.message: Brod je pod kontrolom postaje, zapovjedniče.

THIS_IS_FACTION_POLICE.description: Greeting message in police station. 'faction' is one of (English, non-translatable) strings: 'Solar Federation', 'Commonwealth of Independent Worlds', or 'Haber Corporation', and 'faction_police' is one of: 'SolFed Police Force', 'Confederal Police' or, 'Haber Enforcement Division'

THREE_KPC_ARM.description: Arm of the Milky Way galaxy

TOGGLE_CARGO_WINDOW.description: Label for a button toggling the cargo display window.

TOGGLE_OVERVIEW_SHOW_MOONS.description: toggle whether the overview window shows moons or not

TOGGLE_OVERVIEW_SHOW_STATIONS.description: toggle whether the overview window shows stations or not

TOGGLE_OVERVIEW_SORT_BY_PLAYER_DISTANCE.description: toggle whether the overview window sorts by distance from the player or from the system center
TOGGLE_OVERVIEW_SORT_BY_PLAYER_DISTANCE.message: Prebacivanje između sortiranja prema udaljenosti od igrača i udaljenosti od središta sustava

TOGGLE_OVERVIEW_WINDOW.description: show/hide the overview window / navigation window

TOO_SMALL_FOR_CURRENT_CREW.message: Brod je premalen za trenutnu posadu.

TOO_SMALL_TO_TRANSSHIP.message: Novom brodu nedostaje kapaciteta za trenutni teret i hiperpogon.

TOTAL_DISTANCE.description: Total distance of a (possibly series) of hyper jump(s)

TOTAL_DURATION.description: Total duration of a (possibly series) of hyper jump(s)

TRADING_AT.description: Indicates the current system for inspecting commodities.

TRADING_FROM.description: Indicates the source system of a commodity trade.

TRADING_TO.description: Indicates the destination system of a commodity trade.

TRANSFER_FUEL.description: Label indicating the ability to transfer fuel between equipment tanks

TRANSLATE_VIEW.description: Indicates that the button must be kept pressed down, to translate the camera view with mouse

UNKNOWN_CUSTOM_LOG_ENTRY_FORMAT.message: Nepoznati prilagođeni format unosa u dnevnik

UNKNOWN_FACTION.description: For entry in the flight log

UNKNOWN_LOCATION_IN_SECTOR_X.description: For entry in the flight log

UNKNOWN_STATION_LOG_ENTRY_FORMAT.message: Nepoznati format zapisa u dnevniku stanice

UNSUCCESSFULLY_RECOVERED_PARAMETERS_ARE_.message: Parametri koji nisu uspješno oporavljeni sada su otključani, molimo vas da ih postavite ručno.

VIDEO_CONFIGURATION_RESTART_GAME_TO_APPL.message: Konfiguracija videa (ponovno pokrenite igru ​​da biste je primijenili)

VIDEO_RESOLUTION_DESC.message: Veće rezolucije prikazuju više informacija u manjoj veličini i mogu smanjiti performanse.

VIEW_DESTINATION.description: Tooltip indicating the button will change the current view to the destination of a route.

VOLUME.description: The volume property of some object

VSYNC.description: For the checkbox in settings window

VSYNC_DESC.message: Vertikalna sinkronizacija može ukloniti vizualno kidanje ili artefakte i latenciju ulaza.

WAGE.description: Salary of crew shown in crew roster

WE_HAVE_NO_BUSINESS_WITH_YOU.description: Said by the police to law abiding player

X_CANNOT_BE_TOLERATED_HERE.description: Message to be sent over comms by police when crime is committed by player

YOURE_GOING_TO_REGRET_SACKING_ME.message: Zažalit ćeš što si me otpustio/la!

YOU_DONT_HAVE_ENOUGH_MONEY_FOR_THAT_OPTI.message: Nemaš dovoljno novca za tu opciju.

YOU_MUST_FIRST_SELECT_A_COMBAT_TARGET_CO.message: Prvo morate odabrati borbenu metu, Zapovjedniče.

YOU_MUST_FIRST_SELECT_A_SUITABLE_NAVIGAT.message: Prvo morate odabrati prikladnu navigacijsku metu, Zapovjedniče.

YOU_MUST_REQUEST_LAUNCH_CLEARANCE_FIRST_.message: Prvo morate zatražiti odobrenje za lansiranje, zapovjedniče.

ZOOM.description: Label for a zoom (magnification) control bar.
